arts.ttl: Late Aasgaard goal denies Stevenage a point v Wigan Athletic
arts.sum: Leading 1-0 through a Dale Taylor goal 10 minutes into the second half, the Latics' Jensen Weir simply hacked at the back of Louis Thompson's legs as the midfielder galloped away from him. Wigan only had one real opportunity when Tickle's goal-kick went all the way through to new loan signing Will Goodwin but he curled it wide of the target.

arts.ttl: Wigan Athletic reacts to last-gasp Stevenage victory - 'That felt good'
arts.sum: 'That felt good' - Shaun Maloney's verdict after watching Thelo Aasgaard score another wondergoal to give Wigan Athletic all three points at Stevenage.

arts.ttl: Thelo Aasgaard nets superb stoppage-time free-kick as Wigan see off Stevenage
arts.sum: Dale Taylor had appeared as a half-time substitute and scored 10 minutes later to put the Latics in front, slicking in a Jensen Weir free-kick.

arts.ttl: REPORT: Stevenage 1 Wigan Athletic 2 - Thelo stunner gives 10-man Tics big win
arts.sum: A fantastic free-kick from Thelo Aasgaard in the eight minutes of added time gace Wigan Athletic a well deserved 2-1 victory at Stevenage.

arts.ttl: Wigan Athletic: Two changes in our expected team v Stevenage!
arts.sum: Paul Kendrick runs the rule over the Wigan Athletic squad and predicts the 11 men who Shaun Maloney will select to start at Stevenage on Saturday.

arts.ttl: 'Hell of an offer' needed to secure Wigan Athletic Academy product
arts.sum: Blackpool manager Steve Bruce says it would take 'a hell of an offer' to make him even consider selling Wigan Athletic Academy product Kyle Joseph.

arts.ttl: FA Cup: Chelsea, Man Utd, Liverpool and Tottenham new dates revealed as fourth round TV schedule is announced
arts.sum: Some intriguing ties will take place in the fourth round of the FA Cup

arts.ttl: Manchester United striker joins Wigan Athletic old-boys' network at Carlisle United
arts.sum: Joe Hugill has joined League Two strugglers Carlisle United on loan from Manchester United following his recall from Wigan Athletic.

arts.ttl: Wigan Athletic secure January addition No.5 on loan
arts.sum: Wigan Athletic have added leadership and experience to their engine room for the rest of the season following the loan capture of Blackpool midfielder Ollie Norburn.

arts.ttl: Wigan Athletic: The 12th Man - 'This could be a valuable missing piece of the Wigan Athletic jigsaw...'
arts.sum: Our panel of Latics experts reflect on FA Cup progression in midweek ahead of this weekendâ€™s long trip down to Stevenage...when vital league points will be up for grabs...
